Reviews.Title: “Unique hotel with great location.”
Reviews.Author: QueenOfTheRoad7
Reviews.Content: stayed casablanca 3 nights 2 nights paid 50 additional patio worth extra photo comfy beds nice linens stayed hotel quiet cleaning service inconsistent forgot change sheet night left towels sometimes 1 wash cloth sometimes days none nice tvs front desk mike bar hotel location san juan youre lucky free street parking youll pay nearby garage rates reasonable quick luggage pickup dropoffs front door continental breakfast included rate hotel putting elevator floor prepared carry luggage flights stairs hotel decor nice overall enjoyed stay
